casebody.data:
BAREFOOT
v.
POLK AND THOMAS. No. 54P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 8, 2007. Captain E. Thomas, Captain S.T.G., for Thomas.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of January 2007 by Plaintiff for Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of March 2007."
